highlighted_projects.description: Created using Java and the Java awt library for GUI. This is a fully functional game of Solitaire classic with an extra Vegas Rules game mode. It is available for download free at the link provided.
highlighted_projects.name: Solitaire: Classic and Vegas Rules

highlighted_projects.description: Utilized the Arduino platform to create a simple automated plant watering system. The system was comprised of an Arduino UNO, an LCD screen, a small pump, and several electrical components to make up it's circuit(wires, buttons, Diodes, etc). The user inputs a desired watering interval in hours on the screen and the pump will turn on for 30 seconds at the designated interval.
highlighted_projects.name: Automatic Plant Watering System

jarvis_projects.description: Designed to find various hardware and server usage information from the host and insert the data into a psql database. The project is automated using BASH scripts and sql files.
jarvis_projects.name: Cluster Monitor

name: Devon McNally

professional_experience.description: Developed software projects using standard industry tools and program like git, psql, Java, BASH cli and more. Cooperated with colleagues on these projects using agile/scrum methodology. Involved independently learning new concepts and applying them to real world problems.
professional_experience.title: Software Developer

professional_experience.description: Worked as telecommunications technician in residential neighbourhoods. Highly independent and fast paced environment. Job duties were to install home internet, telephone an tv services. As well as perform a wide variety of testing and repairs on local telecom infrastructure.
professional_experience.title: Residential Technician

summary: Hello my name is Devon and for a long time now I have been wanting to work in software development. Working with new technologies to produce new and interesting products is my goal and I am prepared to do a lot of learning to achieve it. I have multiple ontario college diplomas related to technology and engineering and have a strong aptitude for troubleshooting.
